---
title: "Gabi_StreamPulse"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(devtools)
packages <- c(
  "dataRetrieval", 
  "tidyverse", 
  "xts",
  "dygraphs",
  "StreamPULSE", 
  "streamMetabolizer"
  )
library(StreamPULSE)
library(streamMetabolizer)

Enodat <- request_data(
  sitecode = "NC_Eno",
  variables = c('DO_mgL', 'SpecCond_mScm', 'Discharge_m3s', 'Turbidity_mV', 'pH', 'CDOM_mV', 'WaterTemp_C', 'WaterTemp2_C')
  )

Enodat.lon <- Enodat[[2]]$lon
Enodat.vars <- Enodat[[1]] %>%
  spread(value = value, key = variable) %>%
  mutate(DateTime_Solar = convert_UTC_to_solartime(DateTime_UTC, Enodat.lon))

Enodat.vars2 <- Enodat[[2]] %>%
  mutate(SiteName = name)

Enodat.combined <-
  left_join(Enodat.vars, Enodat.vars2) %>%
  select(DateTime_UTC, DateTime_Solar, SiteName, DO_mgL, Discharge_m3s, SpecCond_mScm, Turbidity_mV, pH, CDOM_mV, WaterTemp_C, WaterTemp2_C)

#Other variables?

```
